meanings.definition: To exert together with another or others.
meanings.sent1: The team coexerted their strength to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The students coexerted their efforts to complete the group project.
meanings.sent3: The ants coexerted their tiny muscles to move the large crumb.
meanings.sent4: The dancers coexerted their movements to create a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent5: The birds coexerted their wings to soar through the sky together.

meanings.definition: To work together in a coordinated effort.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters coexerted to put out the blazing fire.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers coexerted to organize the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The chefs coexerted in the kitchen to prepare a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The musicians coexerted their instruments to produce harmonious music.
meanings.sent5: The athletes coexerted in training to achieve their fitness goals.
